title: By the lords justices and councell. Jo. Borlase. Hen. Tichborne. Whereas we have lately seen a printed paper, intituled, a solemn League and Covenant for reformation and defence of religion the honour and happinesse of the king, and he peace and safety of the three kingdoms, of England, Scotland, and Ireland, which seems to have been printed at London, on the ninth day of October 1643. ...
author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
publicationStmtPublisher: by VVilliam Bladen, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie,
